metadata.title: CVE-2013-4466 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the dane_query_tlsa function in the DANE library(libdane) in GnuTLS 3.1.x before 3.1.15 and 3.2.x before 3.2.5 allowsremote servers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via aresponse with more than four DANE entries.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

guile-gnutls - 3.2.11-2ubuntu1
libgnutls-xssl0 - 3.2.11-2ubuntu1
libgnutls28 - 3.2.11-2ubuntu1
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.2.11-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.11-2ubuntu1').
